name: AFJ Limited
description: Your Partner in Safe, Reliable Transport Solutions. Established in 2006, AFJ Limited provides SEND school transport, non-emergency patient transport, fleet maintenance, vehicle conversions, driver training, and private minibus hire across Birmingham, Manchester, and the West Midlands.

address.streetAddress: AFJ Business Center, 2-18 Forster Street, Nechells

itemOffered.name: Home to School Transport (SEND)
itemOffered.description: Over 700 students transported daily with DBS-checked drivers and passenger assistants. Council-accredited SEND transport across Birmingham and Manchester.

itemOffered.name: Non-Emergency Patient Transport (NEPTS)
itemOffered.description: CQC rated 'Good' patient transport service. NHS trust contracts across West Midlands and North West for renal dialysis, discharge, bariatric, and long-distance transport.

itemOffered.name: Fleet Maintenance
itemOffered.description: In-house vehicle maintenance workshop with skilled technicians and state-of-the-art facilities in Birmingham.

itemOffered.name: Vehicle Conversions
itemOffered.description: VOSA-certified wheelchair-accessible vehicle conversions, ambulance conversions, and luxury minibus conversions.

itemOffered.name: Driver, ACA & PA Training
itemOffered.description: QualSafe-approved training programmes including Driver CPC, Ambulance Care Assistant, and Passenger Assistant certification.

itemOffered.name: Private Minibus Hire
itemOffered.description: Modern fleet of 16-seater wheelchair-accessible minibuses for corporate events, school trips, and group travel.

itemOffered.name: Executive Minibus Hire
itemOffered.description: Luxury minibus hire with driver for corporate travel, events, race days, and airport transfers.

itemOffered.name: Airport Transfers
itemOffered.description: Reliable airport transfer service from Birmingham Airport and beyond with experienced drivers.
